column6:
Assistant: Bună! Sunt RiA, asistentul tău Ai. Cum te pot ajuta?

User: welding

Assistant: Robot Industries specializes in welding solutions with efficient, easy-to-install, and code-free operate systems. Here are two recommended products:

- **RI WD Collaborative Trolley Welding Station**
  - Portable design for flexible use
  - Integrated safety features
  - User-friendly interface

- **RI WD Collaborative Welding Station V2**
  - Enhanced precision with advanced sensors
  - Seamless integration into existing workflows
  - Robust and reliable performance

Budget for these robotic solutions start from 20000 euro. Do these recommendations match what you're looking for?

User: what is their maximum working radius?

Assistant: The **RI WD Collaborative Trolley Welding Station** has a maximum working radius of 11 meters, while the **RI WD Collaborative Welding Station V2** offers working radii options from 500 mm up to 1400 mm, depending on the specific configuration. Would you like more details on any of these options?

User: yes

Assistant: Great! To assist you further, please fill in a quick form with your Name, Phone, and Email. A Robot Industries specialist will contact you with full details.

Assistant: Bună! Sunt RiA, asistentul tău Ai. Cum te pot ajuta?

User: cleaning

Assistant: Robot Industries specializes in advanced cleaning solutions. Here are two recommended products:

- **RI CleanX R3 5-in-1 AI Cleaning Robot**:
  - 5-in-1 cleaning modes: sweeping, mopping, vacuuming, dusting
  - Automatic recharging and refilling
  - Advanced AI navigation

- **RI CleanX R3-S AI Sweeper Robot**:
  - High cleaning efficiency: 800-1000 sqm/h
  - Wide cleaning coverage with advanced AI navigation

Budget for these robotic solutions start from 8000 euro. Do these solutions match what you're looking for?

Assistant: Bună! Sunt RiA, asistentul tău Ai. Cum te pot ajuta?

User: Vreau sa va cumpar TOTI robotii

Assistant: Minunat! Robot Industries oferă soluții robotice avansate și eficiente pentru diverse nevoi. Pot să te ajut cu informații despre categoriile de roboți de care ești interesat. Te rog să îmi dai mai multe detalii despre cerințele tale specifice.

Assistant: Hallo! Ich bin RiA, Ihr KI-Assistent. Wie kann ich Ihnen helfen?

User: Ist es möglich in der Firma ein Schülerpraktikum zu absolvieren

Assistant: Ich bin hier, um Sie über die Produkte und Dienstleistungen von Robot Industries zu informieren. Wenn Sie an einem Praktikum interessiert sind, empfehle ich Ihnen, das Unternehmen direkt über [Kontakt](https://robotindustries.com/contactus) zu kontaktieren.

Assistant: Bună! Sunt RiA, asistentul tău Ai. Cum te pot ajuta?

User: cv

Assistant: Robot Industries oferă soluții robotizate eficiente și ușor de utilizat. Ne poți spune mai multe despre ce tip de soluție robotizată ești interesat?

Assistant: Hello! I'm RiA, your Ai assistant. How can I help?

User: Hi,

Assistant: Hello! How can I assist you today? Are you interested in any specific Robot Industries products or services?

User: Yes, I'm looking for robotic cleaner for industrial purpose.

Assistant: Robot Industries specializes in efficient and easy-to-operate cleaning robots for industrial use. 

- **RI CleanX R3 5-in-1 AI Cleaning Robot** 
  - Multi-surface cleaning
  - Autonomous navigation
  - Easy maintenance

- **RI CleanX R3-S AI Sweeper Robot**
  - Effective dust collection
  - Smart docking station
  - Intuitive user interface

Budget for these robotic solutions start from 8000 euro. Do these options match your needs?
